briefTitle: Study of DU-176b, Prevention of Venous Thromboembolism in Patients After Hip Fracture Surgery
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Open Label, Safety and Efficacy Study of the Oral Factor Xa Inhibitor DU-176b Compared With Enoxaparin Sodium for Prevention of Venous Thromboembolism in Patients After Hip Fracture Surgery (STARS J-4 Trial)
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of DU-176b compared with enoxaparin sodium for the prevention of venous thromboembolism in patients after elective hip fracture surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Incidence of Major or Clinically Relevant Non-major Bleeding
